Room.Name: Before a vast ravine
Room.Description: Before you lies a deep ravine spanned by a wooden bridge ahead. The massive canopy of trees above you destroys any posibility of sunlight breaking through. The forest life about you sings with vibrance, and the smell of moist ground fills the air. The only way through the dense woods is to the north or south.

Exit.Description: A massive ravine opens up in this directions. You can see a small wooden bridge leading to the other side.

ExtraDescription.Description: The forest thickens in this direction. The mass of trees only allows you to see several feet off the trail.
The damp earth is a rich black color with scattered leaves upon it.
A massive canopy covers the sky above your head. Tiny specks of light strugle to make thier way through the foliage.
The forest thickens in this direction. The mass of trees only allows you to see several feet off the trail.

Room.Name: Upon a wooden bridge
Room.Description: An old wooden bridge traverses the deep ravine here. Old tree trunks have been notched and carved to construct this old looking structure. A rushing river lies many feet below you, continuing its endless persuit to shape the land. The forest thickens off to the south, and a large hill rises up in the forest to the north.

ExtraDescription.Description: Large planks of wood a placed closely together forming a bridge across the ravine.
You can see the sky overhead here because of the space the ravine has created.
A massive ravine cuts through the forest in this direction. You can see a small creek running at the bottom.
A massive ravine cuts through the forest in this direction. You can see a small creek running at the bottom.

Room.Name: Before the gates of the Elven Stronghold
Room.Description: A large green hill covered in trees rises up before you. Small windows carved out of the earth can barely be seen at the top of the hill, and several smoke stacks poke through the hillside. A massive gate forged from a strange metal is set directly into the base of the hill, and a golden plaque catches your attention to the left of the gate.

Exit.Description: Massive vines twist and turn forming a massive gate to the north.
A wooden bridge makes its way across the ravine in this direction.

ExtraDescription.Description: Only those who can reach the stars will pass through these gates.
As you look more closely at the bumps you notice they are actually small stars embossed on the face of the stone.
Brown packed dirt covers the ground beneath you.
A massive green hill rises rises high above your head.
A massive wall of grey stone rises up here. You notice a series of small bumps upon the stone.
A massive wall of grey stone rises up here.

Room.Name: The Entrance Hall
Room.Description: You are beneath a spectacular dome painted with dozens of intricate constellations. Tall pillars guilded with gold and silver twist and turn like the roots of a tree to the base of the dome. Strange runes carved from wood sit atop the massive pillars. Intricate archways lead in every direction from this room.

Exit.Description: A massive archway leads into a spectacular room.
A large archway leads into a small room.
A large archway leads into a small room.

ExtraDescription.Description: Smooth marble covers the floor beneath you.
A massive dome open covered in constellations rises above your head.

Room.Name: A Guard Room
Room.Description: A rather small room surrounds you. There is no furniture, only several weapons hang from the wall. Marble covers the entire floor seamlessly, giving it a simple but elegant feel.

Exit.Description: A archway leads back out into the main hall.

ExtraDescription.Description: Smooth marble covers the floor beneath you.
The ceiling here is made of a dull grey stone.
The wall here is made of a dull grey stone.
The wall here is made of a dull grey stone.
The wall here is made of a dull grey stone.

Room.Name: A Guard Room
Room.Description: A rather small room surrounds you. There is no furniture, only several weapons hang from the wall. Marble covers the entire floor seamlessly, giving it a simple but elegant feel.

Exit.Description: An archway leads back out into the main hall.

ExtraDescription.Description: Smooth marble covers the floor beneath you.
The ceiling here is made of a dull grey stone.
The wall here is made of a dull grey stone.
The wall here is made of a dull grey stone.
The wall here is made of a dull grey stone.

Room.Name: A Large Apex
Room.Description: This room is even more spectacular than the room to the south. A double leveled dome rises high above you. On the first level of the dome a painting of a massive library can be seen, and the upper dome is adorned with portraits of unknown elves that seem to look down upon you. Pillars sculpted to resemble tree branches reach high above you supporting the domes. Circular doorways are positioned in the four cardinal directions of the room.

Exit.Description: A circlular doorway is set against the wall here.
A circlular doorway is set against the wall here.
A circlular doorway is set against the wall here.
A circlular doorway is set against the wall here.

ExtraDescription.Description: Smooth marble covers the floor beneath you.
A massive double leveled dome rises up overhead. It is covered with paintings of unknown elves and a massive library.

Room.Name: A Hallway Outside of the Grand Hall
Room.Description: This wide hallway is lined with brass lanterns that causes the shadows to dance about merrily. Wreaths and bouquets of wildflowers decorate the wall inbetween the lanterns. The smells of food and incense wafts down the hall. The smells and light look a bit brighter down the hallway to the east.

Exit.Description: A doorway leads into a grand hall.

ExtraDescription.Description: Smooth marble covers the floor beneath you.
A beautiful white marble covers the ceiling here.
Beautiful wildflowers are placed inbetween the lanterns on the the wall here.
Beautiful wildflowers are placed inbetween the lanterns on the the wall here.

Room.Name: The Grand Hall
Room.Description: You are in the massive hall known best for its merrymaking. Huge wooden tables line the main floor of this room. Near the very center you can see an area cleared out for dancing, and a small place where musicians play. Waiters and servants can be seen bringing trays of food and glasses of fine wine back and forth to the guests.

Exit.Description: The hall continues in this direction.
The hall continues in this direction.
The hall continues in this direction.
A doorway leads out to the hallway.

ExtraDescription.Description: Smooth marble covers the floor beneath you.
A tall wooden ceiling hung with flowers and herbs is above you.

Room.Name: The Center of the Grand Hall
Room.Description: All about you song and dance flow in harmony. The floors shine brightly from the many feet that have danced across it. Encircling this dancing area the musicians play merrily. Above your head the ceiling is a bit taller and you can see that a host of fireflys has made it thier home. Thier tiny lights twinkle and give the ceiling the appearance of a beautiful night sky.

Room.Name: The Upper Gallery
Room.Description: This entire gallery is set several feet above the rest of the hall, giving it a spectacular view. All of the dancing and feasting can be seen in clear view from here. A continous oak table lines the entire upper gallery. These seats are reserved for the distinguished guests of the Elven Lord.

Exit.Description: The hall continues in this direction.
The hall continues in this direction.

ExtraDescription.Description: This massive table is covered with delicacies of every kind. Silver goblets filled with the finest red wine wait to be tasted. The tables legs are carvings of fierce lions bearing their teeth.

Room.Name: An Ornate Hallway
Room.Description: This hallway is extremely extravegant. The walls and floors have been polished and buffed to a bright shine, and intricate designs have been carved across them. The floor is covered in a beautiful rug, and chairs and tall golden lampstands line the halls.

Exit.Description: The hallway continues in this direction.
A massive domed room lies in this direction.

Exit.Description: The hallway continues in this direction.

Room.Name: A Guest Room
Room.Description: A large bed dominates this room. Large silk sheets hang down above the bed and a mass of pillows lies at the head. One large lamp stands in the corner next to a ornate wooden dresser and mirror. A fine rug covers the floor and the ceiling is stensiled with wildflowers.

Room.Name: An Arched Hallway
Room.Description: This floor of this hallway is a beautiful black and white marble. The torches that line either side of the hall send the light dancing across the marble. The ceiling in ths room is arched and is supported by old looking beams of wood that form an elaborate design because of thier formation.

Exit.Description: A beautiful marble covers the wall here.
The hallway continues in this direction.

Exit.Description: The hallway continues in this direction.
A spiral staircase can be seen in the next room.

Exit.Description: The hallway continues in this direction.
The hallway continues in this direction.

Room.Name: The Bottom of a Spiral Staircase
Room.Description: This small alcove contains a large spiral staircase comprised of slabs of grey stone. The stairway spirals high above your head leading to the floors above. Occasional torches are positioned on the way up the stairs, giving off small ammounts of light.

Exit.Description: A massive spiral staircase rises overhead.

Room.Name: Entrance to Gwenidill
Room.Description: The only source of light in this barren room is a single candle that burns in the center. The light from the candle causes shadows to dance across the room. You notice a large rune inscribeD4on the floor near the candle.

Exit.Description: A thick haze prevents seeing the way ahead of you.

ExtraDescription.Description: A massive rune has been inscribeD4on the floor here. Around the rune something has been written in a forgotten language.
As you look more closely at the writing you notice the phrase "HAKRI GWENIDILL MAFRE FINAE" is repeated around the entire rune.

Room.Name: Hall of the Elven Lords
Room.Description: This is the old hall leading to the chambers of the Elven Lord. Various symbols and runes line the hallway here, to declare the glory of the elven race. A long rug woven with gold lines the hall here, along with different portraits of the latest Elven Lords.

Room.Name: Before the Chambers of the Elven Lord
Room.Description: A large door of gold stands here embossed with a large dragon. Vines grow all about the walls near the door and beautiful flowers are in full bloom among the vines.

Exit.Description: A large golden door embossed with a massive dragon is set in the wall here.

Room.Name: The Bed Chambers of the Elven Lord
Room.Description: A spectacular and spacious rooms surrounds you. A breathtaking bed lies in the rear of the room. The bed posts have been carved to look like the trunks of a tree which leaD4 to branches that mingle above the bed. A massive chest sits at the foot of the bed, and a beautiful dresser sits against the wall. Upon the ceiling there is a wonderous scene depicting an ancient temple. Upon the floor an elaborate symbol is carved into the stone itself.

Exit.Description: A doorway leads back out to the hallway.

ExtraDescription.Description: The symbol here is in the form of a five pointed star. At the tip of each star there is a slight indentation as if somthing was meant to be placed there. As you look closer at the star itself, you notice there is some writing in the center.
The key to past lies in the present. Only when the five stars have been united will the way be seen. When the five stars of the Chiliad are together then will the key be revealed.

Room.Name: On a Spiral Staircase
Room.Description: This staircase is comprised of large slabs of grey stone. Occasional torches are positioned on the wall and give off a small ammount of light. The smell of dirt and the moisture in the air give the stairwell an earthy feeling.

Exit.Description: The hallway starts in this direction.
The staircase continues up to the next level.
The staircase spirals down beneath you.

Room.Name: A Wide Hallway
Room.Description: The floor in this hall is made of packed dirt, but it is nearly rock from the ammount of traffic this hallway recieves. The walls are made of fieldstone and there are torches hanging from the ceiling. The smells of fire and metal pervade the area, there is also a fair ammount of heat comming from the walls to the east.

Exit.Description: A staircase lies in this direction.
The hall continues in this direction.

Room.Name: A Split in the Hallway
Room.Description: The floor in this hall is made of packed dirt, but it is nearly rock from the ammount of traffic this hallway recieves. The walls are made of fieldstone and there are torches hanging from the ceiling. The smells of fire and metal pervade the area, there is also a fair ammount of heat comming from the east.

Exit.Description: The hall continues in this direction.
The hall continues in this direction.

Room.Name: A Wide Hallway
Room.Description: The floor in this hall is made of packed dirt, but it is nearly rock from the ammount of traffic this hallway recieves. The walls are made of fieldstone and there are torches hanging from the ceiling. The smells of fire and metal pervade the area, there is also a fair ammount of heat comming from the east.

Exit.Description: A massive forge can be seen in this direction.
The hall continues in this direction.

Room.Name: The Elven Forge
Room.Description: The heat in this room is incredible, dozens of fiery forges are positioned throughout this room. Large ventilation shafts are over each forge leading, to the outside. Countless racks of weapons and armor line the walls. Piles of ignots of every type of metal are near each forge. The light in this room is provided completely by the hot embers in the forge, which send an orange glow throughout the room.

Exit.Description: The forge continues in this direction.
The forge continues in this direction.
The forge continues in this direction.
A hallway can be seen in this direction.

Room.Name: A Wide Hallway
Room.Description: The floor in this hall is made of packed dirt, but it is nearly rock from the ammount of traffic this hallway recieves. The walls are made of fieldstone and there are torches hanging from the ceiling. The smells of fire and metal pervade the area, there is also a fair ammount of heat comming from the east.

Room.Name: The Top of a Spiral Staircase
Room.Description: This staircase is comprised of large slabs of grey stone. Occasional torches are positioned on the wall that give off a small ammount of light. The smell of dirt and the moisture in the air give the stairwell an earthy feeling. Below you, you can see the staircase winding down to the floors below.

Exit.Description: The leads in this direction.
The stairs spiral down beneath you.

Room.Name: A Small Hallway
Room.Description: A fresh breeze flows through the hallway. Light can be seen at the end of the hallway. The walls and floors of the hall are all dirt. The roots of different trees and plants can be seen running through the dirt. Baskets full of arrows are set here and there about the hallway for use by the archers.

Room.Name: Entrance to the Ancient Halls of Gwenidill
Room.Description: A strange glow seems to eminate from the walls here, giving light to the halls. The air is heavy with age, and the absolute silence of these halls is devastating. An inch of dust covers the floor, and the eyes of a thousand years seems to bare down on you. A identical rune to the one in the upper room is inscribeD4on the floor, although it seems to be inverted.

Exit.Description: A thick haze prevents seeing the way ahead of you.
A thick haze prevents seeing the way ahead of you.

Room.Name: A Hallway through Gwenidill
Room.Description: The walls here are made of some form of smooth metal. A strange glow seems to eminate from the walls themselves, giving light to the halls. The air is heavy with age, and the absolute silence is devastating. An inch of dust covers the floor, and the eyes of a thousand years seems to bearD5 on you.

Exit.Description: A thick haze prevents seeing the way ahead of you.
A thick haze prevents seeing the way ahead of you.

Room.Name: Hall of the Elven Chiliad
Room.Description: This massive rectangular room contains six life like statues of elven warriors and mages in full armor or garb. The ceiling has a slight dome to it and golden runes are written across the entire space. Five arched doorways lead out from this room, each doorway containing at least one symbol engraved next to it.

ExtraDescription.Description: The symbol of the Elven Chiliad has been carved into the archway here.
Looking a bit closer you notice the statues hand is clenched, as if it had been once holding a weapon.

Room.Name: Before a Strange Doorway
Room.Description: You are before a small doorway made of a strange wood. There is quite a bit of static electricity in near this doorway, and a cool breeze flows from underneath the doorway.

Exit.Description: A thick haze prevents seeing the way ahead of you.
A thick haze prevents seeing the way ahead of you.

Room.Name: A Large Laboratory
Room.Description: Every sort of bottle, and instruments of exotic make lie all about in this room. Tables stacked with jars of strange powerds and shavings of metal stand against the back wall. A large counter runs nearly the entire walls space. Diagrams and notes are scribbled on peices of parchment and attached to the walls. The floors are made of a smooth non-descript stone, and scorch marks can be seen here and there. The smell of sulfer still hangs about in the air as if it was used only moments ago.

Exit.Description: A thick haze prevents seeing the way ahead of you.

Room.Name: Before a Scorched Gate
Room.Description: A massive blackened gate stands in the south wall here. Scorch marks line all the edges of the gates, and the floor is burnt as well. The gate itself is inscribed with symbols of warning, and a large crown is embossed upon the center.

Exit.Description: A thick haze prevents seeing the way ahead of you.
A thick haze prevents seeing the way ahead of you.

ExtraDescription.Description: You notice a line of writing underneath the embossed crown it reads 'To pass through these gates unwelcome is to welcome almost certain death. '

Room.Name: The Elven Coffers
Room.Description: Several torches are lit on the walls of this massive coffer. Incredible ammounts of gold and riches of every kind are piled high from corner to corner of this room. The ceiling is covered in deadly metal spikes that hang down menacingly. The light from the torches dances upon the treasure, making it look like the remnants of a shattered sun.

Room.Name: The Elven Coffers
Room.Description: Several torches are lit on the walls of this massive coffer. Incredible ammounts of gold and riches of every kind are piled high from corner to corner of this room. The ceiling is covered in deadly metal spikes that hang down menacingly. The light from the torches dances upon the treasure, making it look like the remnants of a shattered sun.

The air is heavy with age, and the absolute silence of these halls is devastating. An inch of dust covers the floor , and the eyes of a thousand years seems to bear down on you.

Exit.Description: A thick haze prevents seeing the way ahead of you.
A thick haze prevents seeing the way ahead of you.

Room.Name: A Large Rotunda
Room.Description: This circular room lies under a large dome. The ceiling of the dome is covered in stars that glow with an inner light. The walls are made of an obsidian that seems to suck up the light around it. Arched doorways lead off in all directions each baring a different symbol above it.

Exit.Description: A thick haze prevents seeing the way ahead of you. Looking up at the archway you notice two concentric circles etched into the keystone.
A thick haze prevents seeing the way ahead of you. Looking up at the archway you notice a star etched into the keystone.
A thick haze prevents seeing the way ahead of you. Looking up at the archway you notice a crown etched into the keystone.
A thick haze prevents seeing the way ahead of you.

Room.Name: Before a Set of Ornate Doors
Room.Description: A large set of oaken doors stand fifthteen feet high in the northern walls. Vines and trees have been carved ornately into the face of the doors. To lanterns containing candles lie on either side of the door frame, and a strange rune is cut into the stone beneath your feet.

Exit.Description: A thick haze prevents seeing the way ahead of you.
A thick haze prevents seeing the way ahead of you.

ExtraDescription.Description: A strange rune made of two concentric circles is etched into the floor here.

Room.Name: The Ancient Gallery
Room.Description: You are on the upper level of a two story room. All along the walls here portraits of the Lords of this stronghold hang with candles on either side. A smooth wood railing runs the edge of the balcony and you can see a massive library on the floor below you.

Exit.Description: A thick haze prevents seeing the way ahead of you.

Room.Name: A Massive Library
Room.Description: Bookshelves rise high up towards the balcony, filled with rows and rows of books, journals, and the recordings of history. Wooden ladders lean up against the shelves so that the higher shelves can be reached. Tall lampstands are placed here and there throughout the room, next to tables and benches. The floor is made of a beautiful black granite, smoothed to perfection. A large spiral staircase leads up to the gallery here.

ExtraDescription.Description: An account of the known traits of the gods of the Chilliadian Pantheon: It had occured to me not only that there was no record of the known gods, but also no great wealth of knowlege about them. Therefore, I have decided to write this small discourse on the known traits of the pantheon. CONTENTS: 1.FAEWRY 2.GRINITH 3.JYRITONOMY 4.HJINIKIN 5.VIRINAHN These traits have been compiled and scribed by, 'Vynith Fawentod' the eternally bound.
Looking upon the bookshelf you notice the titles: The Pantheon of Gwenidill
The sable god of fire, patron of Gwenidill during it's conception.
Depicted as a three headed hydra to represent the aid he lent thrice upon the battlefield of Baratook.
Often depicted as a dragon clutching a scroll, to represent his strength and diplomatic nature.
Lord of the frozen wastes, who would often take the form of a weary traveller.
The god of the night sky, often depicted using simply the crecent moon. It is said he has also gone by the name "Wyntran".

ExtraDescription.Description: Looking upon the bookshelf you notice the titles: Documentation of the Night Sky

The collective works of the observers of the night sky. Within this book lies the detailed descriptions of constellations and there given names. CONTENTS: 1.EPSLIN 2.HAROE 3.LEONIQ 4.JIVINAH 5.PRICIPIS 6.GWENID The page has been torn off after the six entry.....
Description: A mass of ten white stars forming a charging bull.
Description: Eight young yellow stars forming a five pointed crown.
Description: A cluster of white stars which have been named 'Leoniq' or 'White Fist'.
Description: A tight formation of stars forming a great horn.
Description: The largest constellation known, Pricipis is a massive formation of red stars forming a stallion.
Description: The five brightest stars in the night sky.

Room.Name: Behind the Throne
Room.Description: You have stumbled into the secret room behind the massive throne. Lifeless stone walls suround you completely. The only thing that catches your eye is a carving of a lion upon the back wall.

Exit.Description: You see the back of the throne.

ExtraDescription.Description: A beautiful lion in full stride has been etched into the wall here. The lion's mouth is open and there is a small crevice that looks as if somthing could be placed in the mouth.
A beautiful lion in full stride has been etched into the wall here. The lion's mouth is open and there is a small crevice that looks as if somthing could be placed in the mouth.

Room.Name: A Hallway through Gwenidill
Room.Description: The walls here are made of some form of smooth metal. A strange glow seems to eminate from the walls themselves, giving light to the halls. The air is heavy with age, and the absolute silence of these halls is devastating. An inch of dust covers the floor , and the eyes of a thousand years seems to bear down on you.

Exit.Description: A thick haze prevents seeing the way ahead of you.
A thick haze prevents seeing the way ahead of you.

Room.Name: Before a Door Carved with Ancient Runes
Room.Description: A large door covered in the runes of ancient dieties commands attention at the southern wall. All along the walls near the doors small prayers are written to remind others. The floor here is a black marble mixed with veins of gold running throughout. Large golden stands are postioned at either end of the doorway.

Exit.Description: A thick haze prevents seeing the way ahead of you.
A thick haze prevents seeing the way ahead of you.

Room.Name: The Pantheon of Gwenidill
Room.Description: Huge ceilings rise above your head. Massive arches made of stone cross back and forth across the roof, and large murals cover the spaces between. Depictions of gods and thier works have been painted to pay tribute to the them. The entire pantheon is devoid of furnature. In the southern end of the Pantheon a giant alter to the gods is erected. It contains portraits of the gods, or what they are known for, and thier names. Torches burn eternally upon the walls here in the Pantheon.

Exit.Description: A thick haze prevents seeing the way ahead of you.
A thick haze prevents seeing the way ahead of you.
A thick haze prevents seeing the way ahead of you.
A thick haze prevents seeing the way ahead of you.

ExtraDescription.Description: A portrait of a crecent moon hangs upon the wall of the altar here. The portrait itself seems to be hanging a bit crooked.
A portrait of a strange figure shrowded by driving snow hangs upon the wall of the altar here.
A portrait of a dragon like figure holding a scroll in his right claw hangs upon the wall of the altar here.
A portrait of three headed hydra rising up out of the water hangs upon the wall of the altar.
A portrait of an elf like figure engulfed in flames hangs upon the wall of the altar.
Looking closer at the portraits you notice the names of the gods etched underneath. FAEWRY GRINITH JYRITONIMY HJINIKIN VIRINAHN
A beautiful altar made of guilded gold rests before you. Small portaits depicting the gods of old hang from the walls of the altar.

Room.Name: The Inner Sanctum of Virinahn
Room.Description: An infinate plane stretches out in all directions. The ground as far as the eye can see is sand as white as snow. The sky is black and formless with only a single star in the sky above. A constant breeze blows across the plane, but without sound, leaving the impression of an infinite void.

NPC.name: elven elf ranger archer
NPC.description: A large elf draped in green cloaks and a large hood is here with a long bow slung over his shoulder. On his back he wears a full quiver of arrows.
NPC.longDescription: A large archer is here watching the forests.

NPC.name: elf elven blacksmith
NPC.description: A strong elf covered in soot is here, wearing a set of elven mail and a thick apron. His body is muscular from the relentless hammering of armor and weapons.
NPC.longDescription: An strong elf covered in soot hammers out some metal here.

NPC.name: warrior elven elf
NPC.description: A slender elf wearing a complete set of elven chain mail is before you. He posesses a stern visage but carries a twinkle in his eye.
NPC.longDescription: A quick elven guardsman is here preparing for battle.

NPC.name: elf elfven man
NPC.description: A slender elf in bright clothing is here feasting and looking merry.
NPC.longDescription: An elven man is feasting here merrily.

NPC.name: elven elf woman
NPC.description: A beautiful elven woman draped in colerful robes stands here with flowers in her hair and a smile in her eyes.
NPC.longDescription: A beautiful elven woman is enjoying the feasting here.

NPC.name: server waiter elf elven
NPC.description: Dressed in black robes this elf looks a bit overwhelmed by the ammount of food he is carrying around.
NPC.longDescription: An elven server moves quickly through the room with a tray over his head.

NPC.name: elven elf man dancer
NPC.description: Draped in colorful clothing this slender elf wears his blonde hair tied behind his head. His face is young and healthy looking and his eyes sparkle in the light.
NPC.longDescription: A male elf dances about merrily to the music.

NPC.name: elf elven woman dancer
NPC.description: A beautiful female elf smiles happily. She is draped in beautiful clothes of nearly every color. Her hair is braided and laced with beautiful wildflowers.
NPC.longDescription: A slender female elf dances about to the beat of the music.

NPC.name: musician drummer elven elf
NPC.description: He is a large elf in brown leather and a large floppy hat. You notice he has a few drumsticks hanging out of his pocket.
NPC.longDescription: A large elf is here beating on a drum.

NPC.name: elf elven woman harpist harp
NPC.description: With long golden hair cascading down her back you see this elven woman has rose buds througout her hair. She is wearing a beautiful jade dress that matches her gleaming eyes.
NPC.longDescription: A elven woman with beautiful long hair plucks a harp beautifully here.

NPC.name: elf elven musician piccolo
NPC.description: A small elf wearing deep purple robes and a black hat smiles to himself. His face is wrinkled from smiling and his eyes are a bright blue.
NPC.longDescription: A small elf is here playing a silver piccolo.

NPC.name: noble elven elf man
NPC.description: Beautiful golden chains and expensive clothing cover this well groomed elf. His hair and skin are extremely well taken care of and he looks about with a superior tone.
NPC.longDescription: A elven man in extravagant clothing is sitting here.

NPC.name: female elven elf noble
NPC.description: Wearing a beautiful white dress this elven woman is wearing a ring on almost every finger and has a beautiful necklace around her neck.
NPC.longDescription: A beautiful elf in an expensive dress sits here quietly.

NPC.name: spectral dragon blackened bones
NPC.description: A massive spectral dragon flickers slightly before you. Huge blackened bones form its entire body. A deep crimson burns in its eye sockets as it looks towards you.
NPC.longDescription: A massive spectral dragon made of blackened bones rises up before you.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared Flying PassDoor DarkVision

NPC.name: soul elven spectre
NPC.description: A greenish translucense floats before you.
NPC.longDescription: A lost elven soul floats quietly in the room.

NPC.name: elven ambassador
NPC.description: This elven man wears lavish clothing and is extremely well groomed. His face is kind looking and without blemish. His hair is tied neatly behind his head, and he dons a strange looking cap.
NPC.longDescription: A regal elven man stands here stiffly.

NPC.name: celestial titan ambassador
NPC.description: Clad in large robes and a leather belt across his chest you see a very clean looking titan. His hair flows down his back and tied at the very bottom.
NPC.longDescription: A cleancut celestial titan stands here regally.

NPC.name: planar titan ambassador
NPC.description: Clothed in a sky blue cloak and shining steel armor this planar titan carries a small book at his side. On his arm he wears a strange emblem of a wolf. His visage is cast with a bit of worry, and his brow is wrinkled from constant thought.
NPC.longDescription: A massive planar titan is thumbing through a small book here.

NPC.name: sidhe ambassador
NPC.description: Clothed in green robes this sidhe wears a wreath of wildflowers in her hair and a belt of vines around her waste. She hovers silently before you quite breathtakingly.
NPC.longDescription: A beautiful female sidhe is here tending to her image.

NPC.name: minotaur ambassador
NPC.description: An extremely large minotaur is before you. His horns are capped with gold and his hooves have been shined to a soft glow. He wears black leather armor and a large medallion around his neck.
NPC.longDescription: A large minotaur snorts to himself as he paces back and forth.

NPC.name: halfling ambassador
NPC.description: Cloaked in black garb this halfling moves about with unparalleled stealth. His face cannot even be seen past the dark hood he wears over his head.
NPC.longDescription: A small halfling crouches in the shadows here.

NPC.name: stronghold patrol guard
NPC.description: Clothed from head to toe in elven chain mail this patrolman guards the halls with his life.
NPC.longDescription: A member of the stronghold patrol keeps vigil over the halls.

NPC.name: elven elf lord
NPC.description: A tall and slender elven man with long flowing robes, and and elven armor is before you. He is extremely well groomed and wears strange flowers in his long blonde hair. Beautiful eyes of azure emminate grace and goodness, and his skin is milky white and youthfull.
NPC.longDescription: A regal elven man stands here in flowing robes.

NPC.name: human ambassador
NPC.description: A tall and slender human stands before you. Lead-colored eyes peer out from beneath two well groomed eyebrows. His hair is blonde and tied behind his head with a leather band. He wears a short beard which is trimmed to perfection.
NPC.longDescription: A well-kept human stands here, deep in thought.

NPC.name: ancient statue living
NPC.longDescription: A massive statue stands here, breathing heavily.

NPC.name: guardian apparition wispy figure
NPC.description: A thin wispy figure composed of refracting light and a hazy translucence is before you.
NPC.longDescription: A wispy figure floats silently here.

NPC.name: vynith fawentod old man decrepit
NPC.description: An ancient elf clothed in simple robes which have been ravaged by time. Tangled grey hair cascades down upon his shoulders, adding to his discheveled appearance. He looks about with a distant look in his eyes. You notice a large lion has been embroidered on the back of his robe.
NPC.longDescription: A old decrepit elf hunches here with a dismal look upon his face.
